statements: SELECT * FROM adventure_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM adventure_equipment WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM adventure_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Camping';
SELECT * FROM adventure_equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM adventure_equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM adventure_equipment WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT * FROM adventure_equipment WHERE location = 'Outdoor' AND last_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM adventure_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Climbing' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT equipment_name, location FROM adventure_equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Camping' LIMIT 3
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, last_maintenance_date FROM adventure_equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Gym Equipment'
SELECT equipment_id, item_name, maintenance_records FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT * FROM equipment ORDER BY item_name DESC, equipment_type ASC
SELECT availability_id, equipment_id, available, last_checked FROM availability WHERE available = TRUE
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Computer' ORDER BY item_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment_id, maintenance_records FROM equipment WHERE LENGTH(maintenance_records) > 100;
SELECT equipment_id, item_name FROM equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM availability WHERE available = true ORDER BY last_checked DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Adventure_Equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_category FROM Adventure_Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity_in_stock FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, last_maintenance_date FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM Equipment_Usage_Log ORDER BY date_used DESC;
SELECT * FROM Adventure_Equipment ORDER BY equipment_name DESC, quantity_in_stock ASC;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_category, quantity_in_stock FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT e.equipment_name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_type FROM Adventure_Equipment e JOIN Equipment_Maintenance_Log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_type = 'Routine';
SELECT e.equipment_name, COUNT(l.log_id) AS total_usage FROM Adventure_Equipment e LEFT JOIN Equipment_Usage_Log l ON e.equipment_id = l.equipment_id GROUP BY e.equipment_name;

SELECT e.equipment_name, e.quantity_in_stock, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_notes FROM Adventure_Equipment e LEFT JOIN Equipment_Maintenance_Log m ON e.equipment_id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Adventure_Equipment;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Adventure_Equipment ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_category, quantity FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT manufacturer_name, hq_location FROM Equipment_Manufacturer;
SELECT inventory_id, item_id, last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment_Inventory ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM Adventure_Equipment ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, available FROM Adventure_Equipment WHERE item_category = 'Camping' AND available = TRUE;
SELECT e.manufacturer_name, i.last_maintenance_date FROM Equipment_Manufacturer e JOIN Equipment_Inventory i ON e.manufacturer_id = i.inventory_id;
SELECT * FROM AdventureEquipments;
SELECT id, name, location FROM AdventureEquipments WHERE category='Camping';
SELECT name, quantity FROM AdventureEquipments WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, location FROM AdventureEquipments WHERE maintenance_status=true;
SELECT * FROM EquipmentCategories;
SELECT * FROM AdventureEquipments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM AdventureEquipments WHERE maintenance_status = TRUE ORDER BY category ASC;

SELECT e.name, c.category_name, l.location_name FROM AdventureEquipments e JOIN EquipmentCategories c ON e.category = c.category_name JOIN EquipmentLocations l ON e.location = l.location_name WHERE e.quantity < 5;
SELECT e.id, t.transaction_type, t.transaction_date FROM AdventureEquipments e JOIN EquipmentTransactions t ON e.id = t.equipment_id WHERE t.transaction_quantity > 1 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;
SELECT e.name, m.maintenance_date, m.maintenance_notes FROM AdventureEquipments e JOIN EquipmentMaintenance m ON e.id = m.equipment_id WHERE m.maintenance_date <= '2022-08-15' ORDER BY e.name ASC;
